name: HardGolf2D
description:
Hello it's my first game published that i made with Unity !

HardGolf2D is a challenging 2D golf game. There are currently 3 difficult levels where your patience will be tested.

By remaining pressing on left click, your strength bar will increase, and as soon as you release, the ball will be thrown.

Your objective is to finish these 3 levels with as few moves as possible and in minimum time.
